text: India Dock Road to the north. 25.2 The sub-area falls within the London Planâ€™s Isle of Dogs and South Poplar opportunity area. 25.3 The sub-area is a collection of vibrant and distinctive town centres, employment hubs, transport interchanges and residential areas. The sub-area comprises eight distinct character places (see Figure 36). The Tower Hamlets Urban Structure and Characterisation Study provides further information on the key elements of the local character of each place. Vision 25.4 By 2038, the Isle of Dogs and South Poplar will have a cohesive mix of housing, employment and leisure uses within distinctive, inclusive and vibrant neighbourhoods, which have a strong sense of place.
